stories.title: China stocks rise as markets reopen after Lunar New YearPublished2 hours agoMainland markets rallied on the first trading day after a nine-day Lunar New Year break, buoyed by the Supreme Court's decision to strike down Trump's IEEPA tariffs.74 sources

Silver surges past $87 as tariff chaos and geopolitical fears fuel safe-haven rushPublished3 hours agoThe metal jumped roughly 6% on Monday, tripling gold's gains, as Trump's new tariffs and U.S.-Iran tensions rattled markets.71 sources

Gold hits 3-week high after Supreme Court tariff rulingPublished3 hours agoPrices surged as the dollar weakened following the court's decision to strike down Trump's IEEPA tariffs and his move to replace them.42 sources

Cerebras confidentially files for US IPO againPublished3 hours agoThe AI chipmaker revived its public offering plans after withdrawing a previous filing in 2025, now valued at $23 billion.66 sources

Bessent personally led January yen rate checkPublished5 hours agoThe U.S. Treasury secretary initiated the rare currency action without a request from Japan, aiming to prevent a global bond market spillover.60 sources

Dimon says he'll remain JPMorgan CEO for 'a few years'Published5 hours agoThe 69-year-old made the comments at an investor day event where JPMorgan reaffirmed its $105 billion expense outlook and 17% return target.111 sources

DOJ, FTC launch effort to rewrite antitrust rules on competitor collaborationPublished7 hours agoThe agencies are seeking public input on algorithmic pricing, data sharing, and other modern practices not addressed in the original 2000 guidelines.51 sources
